channel.title: Need a command
channel.description: Hey guys I use [b]Deathlypvpz v4 source[/b] and when people vote i need to give them vote points. And every time i add votepoints in there char file it rolls them back. Can anyone make me a command to where it gives them a vote point, 5m, and 2 crystal keys and make it say in there chatbox "Thanks for voting". If Anyone can do this for me I will love you forever (no homo).

item.title: Need a command
item.dc:creator: @The7thSanctum The7thSanctum
item.description:
@The7thSanctum wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("givevotereward)) { try { String playerToReward = playerCommand.substring(15); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToReward)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; Client o = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("You have been rewarded by " + c.playerName+"."); o.sendMessage(playerToReward + " has just been rewarded for voting!"); c2.giveItem(####, #); c2.logout(); break; } } } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

I edited one of my promotion commands. Edit that command with what else you’d like.

o.sendMessage is the global alert.
c2.sendMessage is the rewarded player alert.

It’s not the best and I did edit it through here, so I’m not sure if you’ll get any errors. If you can’t fix them, don’t bother trying with a RSPS. DeathlyPvpz would be something horrible to start with.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a command
item.dc:creator: @Sessy_Pk3r Sessy Pk3r
item.description:
@Sessy_Pk3r wrote:

Well I’m not going to spoon feed you; you’re best off checking the snippets section.

item.title: Need a command
item.dc:creator: @tgm_clan tgm clan
item.description:
@tgm_clan wrote:

Bump How can i make it a owner command. I dont want to strip parts of commands to make it too lazy. Anyways i want to do like ::givevotereward (name) for the people who voted.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a command
item.dc:creator: @Sessy_Pk3r Sessy Pk3r
item.description:
@Sessy_Pk3r wrote:

It would go something like

if(commandStartswith("claim"){ votePoint++; giveItem(##,##); sendMessage("##"); }

Those are PI conventions but you should be able to figure it out.

Read full topic
